description: HARIMOHAN PARUVU is a writer and an executive coach. He completed his Civil Engineering and MBA from Osmania University, and worked in the corporate sector for a decade before focusing his attention on writing. His previous books include The Men Within – A Cricketing Tale, If You Love Someone... and 50 Not Out! He lives in Hyderabad with his wife Shobha and his daughter Anjali. He can be contacted at harimohanp@gmail.com.
name: Harimohan Paruvu
